languages.text: "Остановитесь, хватит! Это же живые люди, как вы можете убивать их вот так, походя?"

traits.locale_text: "Остановись, хватит! Это же живые люди, как ты можешь убивать их вот так, походя?"

languages.text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"
languages.original_text: "Остановитесь, хватит! Это же живые люди, как вы можете убивать их вот так, походя?"

traits.locale_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"
"Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"
"Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"
"Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"
"Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

languages.text: 「やめろ、もうたくさんだ！彼らは生きた人間だ！なぜこのように理由もなく殺すことができる？」
languages.original_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

traits.locale_text: 「やめろ、もうたくさんだ！彼らは生きた人間だ！なぜこのように理由もなく殺すことができる？」

languages.text: “快住手，够了！那些都是活生生的人！你怎么能这样无缘无故地杀死他们？”
languages.original_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

traits.locale_text: “快住手，够了！那些都是活生生的人！你怎么能这样无缘无故地杀死他们？”

languages.text: "Hört auf, das reicht! Das sind lebende Menschen! Wie könnt Ihr sie einfach so töten, völlig willkürlich und grundlos?"
languages.original_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf, das reicht! Das sind lebende Menschen! Wie könnt Ihr sie einfach so töten, völlig willkürlich und grundlos?"

languages.text: « Arrêtez ! Ce sont des êtres vivants ! Comment pouvez-vous les tuer de la sorte, sans la moindre raison ? »
languages.original_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez ! Ce sont des êtres vivants ! Comment pouvez-vous les tuer de la sorte, sans la moindre raison ? »

languages.text: «¡Basta, para ya! ¡Esas personas están vivas! ¿Cómo puedes matarlas de ese modo, sin ningún motivo?».
languages.original_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta, para ya! ¡Esas personas están vivas! ¿Cómo puedes matarlas de ese modo, sin ningún motivo?».

languages.text: "Yeter artık, buna derhâl son ver! Kanlı canlı insan onlar! Ortada bir neden yokken onları öylece öldürmeye nasıl cüret edersin?"
languages.original_text: "Stop it, that's enough! Those are living people! How can you kill them like that, without rhyme or reason?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeter artık, buna derhâl son ver! Kanlı canlı insanlar onlar! Ortada hiçbir neden yokken, onları öylece öldürmeye nasıl cüret edersin?"
